import React, {Component} from "react" class Template extends Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { fullname: "", email: "", password:"", qualification: "", area:"", contact:"", } this.changehandler = this.changehandler.bind(this); this.submithandler = this.submithandler.bind(this); } submithandler(){ fetch('http://localhost:4000/signup',{ method: 'post', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'accept': "application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify({ "fullname":this.state.fullname, "email":this.state.email, "password":this.state.password, "qualification":this.state.qualification, "area":this.state.area, "contact": this.state.contact, }) }) } changehandler = name => event => { this.setState({ [name]: event.target.value }) } render(){ return(
Sign Up Form by Colorlib

Create account

{/*
*/}
{/*

Have already an account ? Login here

*/}
) } } export default Template
